data.title: Hungarian Refiner Mol Seeks Croatia Oil Pipeline Deal to End Russia Dependence
data.meta_description: Hungarian refiner Mol Nyrt is in talks to use Croatia’s oil pipeline network as it works to wean itself off Russian supplies, according to a senior company executive.
data.text:
Hungarian refiner Mol Nyrt is in talks to use Croatia’s oil pipeline network as it works to wean itself off Russian supplies, according to a senior company executive.

“Our intention at the moment is to clearly develop the alternative possibilities,” Peter Ratatics , Mol’s 40-year-old executive vice president for consumer services, said in an interview on Friday. “In a conflict zone, how long can you have a stable supply in a pipeline that’s always in danger?”
